ygData.subject: RE: Re: Bards always complaining
ygData.msgSnippet: um what bug did they fix? IMNHO they broke the animation now. ... From: Wayne Sheppard [mailto:mrwayne@mindspring.com] Sent: Sunday, November 14, 1999 10:45 AM
ygData.messageBody:
um what bug did they fix? IMNHO they broke the animation now.

-----Original Message-----
From: Wayne Sheppard [mailto:mrwayne@...]
Sent: Sunday, November 14, 1999 10:45 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] Re: Bards always complaining


From: "Wayne Sheppard" <mrwayne@...>

Only Bards would complain about being Nerfed when Verant FIXES a bug that
doesn't Nerf a class.

>
> But I don't want to stop surfing, does anyone? I think that is one of
our
> coolest animations that we surf across the ground as we blaze across
Norrath
> in a cacophony of light bubbles. It will be a sad day indeed when even
our
> appearance is nerfed. Heaven above forbid bards should look cooler at
any
> time than someone else. That might be unbalancing. Never mind that we
have
> a stick for a drum, and we strum it!
>
> Kitasi, tired of being nerfed on E'ci

Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to toren@... with
the subject lol.
